Authors:
Tuula M. Niskanen, Kare Liimatainen, Joseph F.
Ammirati
Title:
Five new Telamonia species (Cortinarius, Agaricales) from
western North America
Keywords:
ITS, molecular systematics, rpb2, taxonomy,
Agaricales
Abstract:
Five new Cortinarius species in subgenus Telamonia are
described from western North America: C. alboambitus, C. brunneovernus,
C. fructuodorus, C. nauseosouraceus, and C. politus. Phylogenetic
relationships of the species were inferred by analysis of ITS and rpb2.
The placement of C. brunneovernus in sect. Brunnei, C. fructuodotus in
sect. Telamonia and C. nauseosouraceus in sect.
Cinnabarini/Uracei/Colymbadini is strongly supported. C. alboambitus
grouped with species in the clade /Furvolaesi with a support of 0.83 PP,
and C. politus with the species in sect. Boulderenses with 0.67 PP. The
descriptions of these species are presented and a comparison to similar
species is provided.
